display_long_description:
**What happens when you stop acting human — and start acting like a panda?**

In I Am Panda, your instincts shape everything.
What you eat, what you break, and how you move
all change how people react to you.

🎋 **Eat Like a Panda — Be Loved**

Eat bamboo piece by piece.
Pick up food with your mouth.
Enjoy the simple joy of eating.
NPCs notice what you eat.
Good behavior can make them like you more —
sometimes enough that they can’t take their eyes off you.
[media]


😈 **Cause Trouble — Face the Consequences**

Grab. Smash. Throw.
Make a mess like a real panda would.
[media]
Break the wrong things, and NPCs will get angry, chase you down, and try to stop you. Fight back. Don’t let them succeed.
[media]
🐾 **Live Inside a Panda Body**
Walk using your panda arms.
Climb, push, and move with your own weight.Feel clumsy, heavy, and alive.
[media]

If you’re curious about the vision, want to give feedback, or just want to share silly panda memes — come hang out in the community: 👉 Join the Discord https://discord.gg/2upDZSU2
